text: Unless licensed in accordance with this part, no person shall use the words or terms "elevator contractor," "elevator mechanic," "licensed elevator contractor," "licensed elevator mechanic," "elevator inspector," "licensed elevator inspector," or any words describing an elevator specialty licensed by the Board to imply that the person is authorized to perform the services of an elevator contractor, elevator mechanic, or elevator inspector in the District.
historical:
